content.name: door_set
content.label: Door Set
content.gloss: a door and its outside frame

content.name: hinge
content.label: Hinge
content.gloss: a joint that holds two parts together so that one can swing relative to the other

content.name: outside_frame
content.label: Outside Frame
content.gloss: a outside door frame that connects the door to the wall

content.name: door
content.label: Door
content.gloss: a hinged, sliding, or revolving barrier at the entrance to a building, room, or vehicle, or in the framework of a cupboard

content.name: surface_board
content.label: Surface board
content.gloss: a wood/steel/plastic made board of door

content.name: horizontal_bar
content.label: Horizontal Bar
content.gloss: a bar-like part that is horizontal to the ground

content.name: vertical_bar
content.label: Vertical Bar
content.gloss: a bar-like part that is vertical to the ground

content.name: slant_bar
content.label: Slant Bar
content.gloss: a bar-like part that is 30-60 degree with respect to the ground

content.name: complex_decoration
content.label: Complex Decoration
content.gloss: a irregular shape decorative part on the door

content.name: glass
content.label: Door Glass
content.gloss: a glass part on the door

content.name: handle
content.label: Handle
content.gloss: a handle that people can use to pull open and off a door

content.name: fixed_part
content.label: Door Handle Fixed Part
content.gloss: the part of the door handle that is fixed on the door surface

content.name: movable_part
content.label: Door Handle Movable Part
content.gloss: the part of the door handle that is movable/rotatable/switchable by human hand
